short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows you to keep track of the Asana tasks you've worked on today.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For those who would like to keep track of the Asana tasks they've been working on. Uses chrome storage to add your tasks to a list, which can be viewed in a separate tab. This list can be copied to your clipboard, then cleared when you wish. 

Visit the github repo at https://github.com/hzuber/asana-task-manager. Feel free to contribute!

Upcoming features: automatic delete
